t to check if anyone know there is mockobject that

nit to simulate the webserver,

HttpUnit (us=
ed by JWebUnit) provides two alternatives, depending on
what you are trying=
 to do. If you are developing servlets, ServletUnit
allows you to build the=
m test first without a servlet container. If
you are focusing on web client=
 development, PseudoServer can simulate
a webserver, returning predefined r=
esponses. The unit tests included
with HttpUnit demonstrate both.
